definition[0]: the day after Thankgiving in the US, when stores open early and prices are reduced. Black Friday is one of the busiest shopping days of the year
definition[1]: Friday September 24,1869, when a group of investors tried to take control of the US gold market and caused a recession
definition[2]: any Friday when something bad happens
example[0]: Employees refer to the day when the job cuts were announced as “Black Friday”.
definition[3]: Friday September 24,1869, when a group of investors tried to take control of the US gold market and were considered to have caused a RECESSION
example[1]: The latest cuts at the organization were made on what staffers referred to as Black Friday.
